TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMessageSink

summary.span: 定义消息接收器的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface for a message sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当方法调用的代理服务器上时，远程处理基础结构用于将自变量传递到实际的对象，与在远程处理边界之间提供必要的支持，调用带有参数的实际对象方法并返回结果回代理对象的客户端。When a method call is made on the proxy, the remoting infrastructure provides the necessary support for passing the arguments to the actual object across the remoting boundaries, calling the actual object method with the arguments, and returning the results back to the client of the proxy object. 远程方法调用是从客户端将转到服务器端的消息，并可能返回。A remote method call is a message that goes from the client end to the server end and possibly back again. 远程方法调用它的方式跨越远程处理边界，因为传递的链`IMessageSink`对象。As it crosses remoting boundaries on the way, the remote method call passes through a chain of `IMessageSink` objects. 链中的每个接收器接收该消息对象，执行特定操作时，委托给链中的下一个接收器。Each sink in the chain receives the message object, performs a specific operation, and delegates to the next sink in the chain. 代理对象包含与第一个引用`IMessageSink`它需要使用来开始该链。The proxy object contains a reference to the first `IMessageSink` it needs to use to start off the chain. 对于异步调用时的委派，每个接收器都提供答复接收器 (另一个`IMessageSink`) 在其返回途中答复时将由下一个接收器调用的。For asynchronous calls, at the time of delegation, each sink provides a reply sink (another `IMessageSink`) that will be called by the next sink when the reply is on its way back. 不同类型的接收器执行不同操作，具体取决于收到的消息对象的类型。Different types of sinks perform different operations, depending on the type of message object received. 例如，一个接收器可能会导致要执行的锁、 另一个可能强制实施调用安全、 另一个可能执行流调用控件和可靠性服务和而另一个无法传输到其他调用，进程或计算机。For example, one sink could cause a lock to be taken, another could enforce call security, another could perform flow call control and reliability services, and yet another could transport the call to a different , process, or computer. 链中的两个或多个消息接收器可以进行相互交互与每个特定的操作有关。Two or more message sinks in the chain can interact with each other in regard to each specific action. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现接口。The following code example shows the implementation of the interface. 请注意，该示例假设类型定义和必须提供的示例待办编译的程序集引用。Note that the sample assumes type definitions and assembly references that must be provided for the sample to compile. [!code-cpp[IMessageSink_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMessageSink_Client/CPP/imessagesink_client.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[IMessageSink_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMessageSink_Client/CS/imessagesink_client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[IMessageSink_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IMessageSink_Client/VB/imessagesink_client.vb#3)]

para.span: 务必要注意实现当前接口的代码必须提供两个实现和，因为同步调用可以转换为异步调用，反之亦然。

span.span: It is important to note that code implementing the current interface must provide implementations for both and , since synchronous calls can be converted to asynchronous calls and vice versa.

para.span: 必须实现这两种方法，即使接收器不支持异步处理。

span.span: Both methods must be implemented, even if the sink does not support asynchronous processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl AsyncProcessMessage(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage msg, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink replySink) cil managed
Public Function AsyncProcessMessage (msg As IMessage, replySink As IMessageSink) As IMessageCtrl

span.span: The message to process.

param.name: replySink
param.span: 答复消息的答复接收器。

span.span: The reply sink for the reply message.
Asynchronously processes the given message.

returns.span: 返回 接口，该接口提供一种在调度异步消息之后控制这些消息的方法。

span.span: Returns an interface that provides a way to control asynchronous messages after they have been dispatched.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过远程处理基础结构或异步消息的上一个接收器，在消息接收器上调用此方法。This method is invoked on the message sink by the remoting infrastructure or by a previous sink for asynchronous messages.

exception.span: 直接调用方通过引用接口进行调用，且没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.

permission.span: 用于操作基础结构代码。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.
Demand value: ; Permission value:

Synchronously processes the given message.
A reply message in response to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用在消息接收器上通过远程处理基础结构或同步消息的上一个接收器。The method is invoked on the message sink by the remoting infrastructure or by a previous sink for synchronous messages.
